meanings.definition: An element of a culture or system of behavior that may be considered to be passed from one individual to another by nongenetic means, especially imitation.
meanings.sent1: Kids at school often share funny memes with each other.
meanings.sent2: The internet is full of memes that people enjoy sharing.
meanings.sent3: My friend tried to imitate the popular meme dance but ended up looking silly.
meanings.sent4: The meme of kindness spread through the community like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The meme about teamwork was so catchy that everyone started working together more.

meanings.definition: An image, video, piece of text, etc., typically humorous in nature, that is copied and spread rapidly by internet users.
meanings.sent1: I saw a hilarious meme about cats on social media.
meanings.sent2: Memes can make people laugh and brighten their day.
meanings.sent3: The meme with the dancing penguin made me giggle.
meanings.sent4: That meme of the surprised cat perfectly captures my reaction.
meanings.sent5: The meme of the clumsy dog went viral in no time.
